EmailTemplate.name: Extension to due date
EmailTemplate.subject: Extension to due date
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for your update on Student's thesis examination.
The report due date has been extended to [new due date].
Please do not hesitate to contact me if you require more time to complete the examination.
Kind regards _______________________ ​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
{!Case.Thread_Id}
